metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2688 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
buf_pullup in Tor before 0.2.4.26 and 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.11 does notproperly handle unexpected arrival times of buffers with invalid layouts,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertionfailure and daemon exit) via crafted packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2688` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1').
